locations.title: Isle of Palms County Park
locations.street: 1 14th AvePark with beach access & sand volleyball "Plenty of showers
locations.content: Isle of Palms County Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: My absolute “go to” for a 10 hour beach day! Yes, 10 hours. The beach is always clean and spotless. The lifeguards are super vigilant and conscientious of everything that’s going on. They are kind to everyone who comes by and very gracious. Thanks for one of the best days!

Great spot for a day at the beach. It's $15 for parking during the week and $25 on the weekend. Our airbnb had a pass which was great. There are nice bathrooms, changing stalls, and lots of places to rinse off. My kids liked the playground and I liked the lifeguards 10am -6pm!

The Isle of Palms County Park is great! It's easy to get to and parking is pretty easy. I love that they have restrooms, bath houses, a playground and shaded areas. The ramp is convenient for the beach carts and if you need anything, the store has it all. Very kid friendly.

Beautiful clean beach
It cost $15 to park.  There were bathrooms, changing rooms, outdoor showers, and places to rent chairs and sand supplies.  No lifeguards when we were there on a Sunday in April.  Miles of beach!

Such a nice, clean, beautiful outdoor space! Free public showers - probably 20 shower heads for rinsing off which was so convenient. The bathrooms are very clean and well kept. Makes for easy access to the beach. The free showers are really …

… to put chairs if you didn't have an umbrella or shade with you. Place also has changing rooms, a station to shower body and feet, and even misting stations to cool down. Some shells, but is busy place and distance from water to stairs is …
… Restroom, change rooms, shower to clean from the send, small playground, small kiosk and Volleyball court
Great park and beach access. Dressing arrangements, bathrooms and shower area were fantastic.
Positives: Large parking lot. Two different shower areas, real bathrooms, outdoor changing stalls, picnic tables, playground, large beach, pier, easy location to find. Popsicle and snack stand! …

Love it, all amenities even wash house with private shower stalls and bathroom changing areas. Clean ,well kept and attended. Closes before area attractions like restaurants and shops tho not so great ,if you don't notice the time. Beach is …

Iop is always our go to beach spot. Very clean and they've upgraded the shower sections and bathrooms. There's even a bar with super cute hammocks section that's right at the bottom of the stairs where it separates the bar and that …

Love coming to the beach here, the waves are perfect for body bordering. They have shower areas and changing stalls there too. Rentals for chairs and umbrellas. Just got to pay for parking at the front gate.

showerReviews.reviewText: The Park West Recreation fields and track are well kept and there are restrooms, as well. You may see me there, running, coaching or just enjoying the trails of Laurel Hill, next door. The park is safe and dog friendly. Please do not litter and be respectful of others. A great place to play!
Always a nice , clean, welcoming atmosphere. The wife and I come pretty much every weekend to bring our daughter to the playground. Great place to bring the little ones!!
Great facilities, lots of space for kids to play. They have a dog park, playground, multiple ponds to fish and a running track. Very buggy

showerReviews.reviewText: … Right now with Covid though there are restrictions.  No showers.  That was a bummer.  You can share a pool but not a shower area? …
